Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional mortgage recording tax
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional mortgage recording tax until December 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 98 of the laws of 2009 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional mortgage recording tax, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
